DOC.brief_summary: This study evaluate safety efficacy FTY720 combine tacrolimus corticosteroid patient receive kidney transplant
DOC.brief_title: Efficacy Safety FTY720 de Novo Adult Renal Transplant Recipients
DOC.criteria: Inclusion Criteria Completed 12 month core study Informed consent Exclusion Criteria N/A Other protocoldefined exclusion criterion may apply .
